author: lundblad
msg: Make 'svn cleanup' not fail on a missing .svn/tmp directory.  It is
removed and rebuilt anyway so failing if it does not exist is
(svn_io_remove_dir): Deprecate.  All callers updated to use
fail if the tmp directory doesn't exist.
(basic_cleanup): Add regression: missing tmp-dir in cleanup.

author: cmpilato
msg: (check-javahl): Fix a bit of inconsistent spacing.

author: nikclayton
msg: extraction of a single method using gen_method_defs.  Add a hack that
prevents the POD embedded in the bundled template from being parsed

author: nikclayton
msg: Augment gen_method_defs to sort method names and generate stub POD
template.  It now sorts the list of method names before producing the
output, and the template includes stub POD documentation for the method.
